projects.title: Figure Skating Association Platform
projects.description: A portal has been developed that serves as a unified platform for thousands of amateur figure skaters and organizations. The primary objective was to address the issue of the absence of a unified mechanism for organizing competitions, as well as to facilitate easy access to this sport for the general public
projects.subtitle: Web \ Mobile

projects.title:
The largest platform in Europe for the MMO
game Lineage 2
projects.subtitle: Web \ Mobile \ Branding
projects.description: The main task was to solve the problem of scaling the project, which the old design could no longer cope with. As well as the need to create a multifunctional personal account on its platform, which facilitates user interaction with the gaming client

projects.title: Wikipedia MMO Lineage 2
projects.subtitle: Web
projects.description:
The task was to create a knowledge base combining dozens of disparate, incomplete and difficult-to-use databases that users had previously used.

There was an acute problem in the community, which was solved by this project in the first place - the inconsistency of data from database to database, as well as their incompleteness and a large amount of unnecessary data, which made any work with information difficult
